text: Mara Cristina Gabrilli (born 28 September 1967) is a Brazilian psychologist, advertiser and politician. She was elected as a federal deputy from 2011 to 2019. In 2019, she was elected to the federal senate. She became a quadriplegic in 1994 because of a car accident. Gabrilli is an activist for people with disabilities. Gabrilli is the MDB nominee for Vice President of Brazil in the 2022 election. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from São Paulo Category:Scientists from São Paulo Category:Businesspeople from São Paulo Category:Psychologists Category:Brazilian activists Category:Brazilian people with disabilities Category:Disability activists
title: Mara Gabrilli
